body.p: Boyle County, Kentucky, farmer. Boyle County, Kentucky, native. Married to Mary Pope Bruce in Garrard County, Kentucky, on August 14, 1829. Father of William Bruce, Martha N. Bruce, Thomas Bruce, Leonard Bruce, Alamander P. Bruce, Margaret E. Bruce, Hayden M. Bruce, Buckner M. Bruce, John M. Bruce, and Richard Dunlap Bruce. Farmer in Boyle County in 1850. Owned thirteen enslaved persons in Boyle County in 1850. Farmer in Boyle County in 1860. Owned nineteen enslaved persons in Boyle County in 1860. Held two additional enslaved persons as agent in Boyle County in 1860.
